name: Power Solutions International, Inc.
description: Power Solutions International, Inc. (PSI) is a leading provider of advanced engine solutions focusing on the development and manufacturing of power generation products. Founded in 2009 and headquartered in Wood Dale, Illinois, PSI specializes in providing innovative engine systems and power products for various applications, including industrial, commercial, and agricultural markets. The company prides itself on its commitment to sustainability, offering alternative fuel solutions such as natural gas and propane engines that help reduce emissions and enhance operational efficiencies. PSI's product portfolio includes a wide range of engines and power systems, from small engines for portable generators to large-scale units for stationary power generation. Underpinned by a strong R&D pipeline, PSI continuously strives to enhance its product offerings through cutting-edge technology and customer feedback. The company’s mission is to deliver superior engine solutions that meet the evolving needs of its customers while promoting a cleaner environment. With a dedicated team of engineers and industry experts, PSI is positioned to lead the way in the power solutions industry, contributing to both economic growth and environmental responsibility.
ceo: Jason D. S. L. R. Wong

key_executives.name: Jason D. S. L. R. Wong

faq.answer: PSI is headquartered in Wood Dale, Illinois, USA.

faq.question: What types of engines does PSI offer?
faq.answer: PSI offers natural gas, propane, and diesel engines.
